childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
## Software Engineering Summer Analyst, J.P.Morgan
*Jun 2020 - Aug 2020 | Singapore*  

## Research Assistant in Computer Vision, National University of Singapore
*Feb 2019 - Oct 2019 | Singapore*  
- Selected as one out of 40 undergraduates to assist in data processing and annotating Tasty Videos dataset, a collection of 4000 recipes for zero-shot learning, recognition and anticipation.
- Design and develop downloadable dataset websites for multiple soon to be published research studies in Computer Vision.
- Process videos and images for data analysis purposes using OpenPose, a real-time multi-person key point detection library for body, face, hand and foot estimation.

## Freelance Web Application Developer, GoldSilver Central Pte. Ltd.
*Jun 2019 - Jul 2019 | Singapore*  
- Collaborated as a pair to develop and design a full-stack storage viewing web application with back-end admin panel using MERN framework (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js).

## Web Application Developer Intern, Cudy Pte. Ltd.
*Sep 2017 - Oct 2017 | Singapore*
- Collaborated with development team to design, create and develop a front-end system in Angular 4 for a live streaming EdTech web platform

## Marketing and Communications Intern, Science Centre Singapore
*Apr 2017 - Aug 2017 | Singapore*
- Assisted in overseeing the redevelopment of the corporate website, media previews and large-scale events.
- Evaluated over 15 proposals sent in by web development vendors for approval by the board.
- Conducted market research on website demographics and proposed suggestions on continuous improvement initiatives to board.

## National University of Singapore
*Aug 2018 - Expected May 2021*  
Bachelor of Computing in Computer Science
